address: 333 West Santa Clara Street, Suite 618, San Jose, CA 95113

valueProp: Clayton & McEvoy P.C. aims to provide legal expertise and professional integrity of the highest quality at a reasonable cost. We represent and support many dedicated individuals and businesses in the fields of technology, communications, science and medicine, real estate, land use and development in Silicon Valley.
